Standard HID Boot Protocol Keyboard Report. More...

#include <HID.h>

Data Fields

Detailed Description

Type define for a standard Boot Protocol Keyboard report

Field Documentation

uint8_t USB_KeyboardReport_Data_t::KeyCode[6]

Key codes of the currently pressed keys.

uint8_t USB_KeyboardReport_Data_t::Modifier

Keyboard modifier byte, indicating pressed modifier keys (a combination of HID_KEYBOARD_MODIFER_* masks).

uint8_t USB_KeyboardReport_Data_t::Reserved

Reserved for OEM use, always set to 0.
